translations: 把……求和，计算……的总数；总结（summate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The values of the settlement are approximation with calculated value of summating for each layer and calculated values on prototype of numerical analysis. Therefore, this method is very feasible.
sentences.translation: 模型试验实测沉降量与用分层总和法、数值分析法计算结果接近。
